greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of Stolarsky representation of n.
comment: For the Stolarsky representation of n, see the C. Mongoven link.
link: Casey Mongoven, Description of Stolarsky Representations
example: The Stolarsky representation of 19 is 11101. This is of length 5. So a(19) = 5.
results.author: _Casey Mongoven_, Nov 19 2011
